lead_paragraph: TASKER--John, age 76, a native of Greenport, Long Island, last week after a short illness. Son of late Madeline Iacovino and Supreme Court Justice Henry Tasker. Graduate of Brown University, BA ('61), MA ('64). A leader of Brown Crew's move from club to varsity sport in late 1950s followed by many victories. U.S. Navy 1965-1976, LCDR; served as Adjutant to President Naval War College; Operation Market Time, Vietnam, USS Finch (DER-328); Communications Officer, USS Long Beach (CGN-9); and Senior Adjutant to US commander of NATO Atlantic fleet. After Navy, Lykes Bros. Steamship Company and many years in Craftsman antique furniture trade in Manhattan. John leaves a twin, Arthur M. Tasker (Lucia Staniels) of Greenport; niece Alexandra Tasker Marx (Peter) and great-nephew Theodore Marx of Los Angeles; many cousins and four godchildren. Interment in Stirling Cemetery, Greenport, NY, August 6, 2016 2:00pm. Contributions to Brown University or God's Love We Deliver. 1/3
